sentences.chinese: 過時自合飄零去，恥向東君更乞憐。

sentences.english: She crouched low like a fawning dog.
sentences.chinese: 她蜷縮在地上，象只搖尾乞憐的狗。

sentences.english: The sorrowful widow begged for mercy.
An enemy who lies at your feet begging forgiveness must not feel your sword.
sentences.chinese: 對俯伏在你腳下乞憐的敵人，絕不可使他觸及你的劍。

sentences.english: An enemy who lies at thy feet begging forgiveness must not feel thy sword.
sentences.chinese: 對俯伏在你腳下乞憐的敵人，絕不可讓他觸及你的劍。

sentences.english: However, as long as police officers through, it will immediately jump fawning.
sentences.chinese: 不過，只要有員警經過，它就會立刻跳起來搖尾乞憐。

sentences.english: He said he would never grovel before a conqueror.
sentences.chinese: 他說他永遠不會在征服者腳下搖尾乞憐。

sentences.english: The puppy was fawning on its master.
sentences.chinese: 小狗向它的主人搖尾乞憐。

sentences.english: They are like a begging of the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他們就象一隻搖尾乞憐的喪家之犬。
